question: [Detailed] Francais: Donnez which category has the highest bar depuis le diagramme en barres.

qas.question: [Detailed] Francais: Donnez which category has the highest bar depuis le diagramme en barres.
[Rapid] Dansk: Angiv which category has the lowest bar fra sojlediagrammet.
[Calm] English: Tell what is the difference between the tallest and shortest bars from the bar chart.
